Uses of Class
tripleplay.ui.Selector

  • Packages that use Selector 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of Selector in tripleplay.ui

      Methods in tripleplay.ui that return Selector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Selector Selector.add(Element<?> elem, Element<?>... more)
      Tracks one or more elements.
      Selector Selector.add(Elements<?> elements)
      Tracks the children of elements for setting the selection.
      Selector Selector.preventDeselection()
      Prevent a deselection (null selected.get()) occurring as a result of toggling the currently selected button off.
      Selector Selector.remove(Element<?> elem, Element<?>... more)
      Stops tracking one or more elements.
      Selector Selector.remove(Elements<?> elements)
      Stops tracking the children of elements for setting the selection.
